The Trade Manager¶

The trade manager object will be managing all events, and do the polling. Later on (If not already) it will also manage the description cache.

Login¶

login(async_client)[source]¶

Take a AsyncClient object, using the do_login method is optional. You must have passed in all credentials and requirements to the client already. :param steam_client: :class AsyncClient: :return: None

run_forever()[source]¶

Run the bot forever, unless the time sense calling the function is greater than timeout. :param timeout: :class int/float: :return:
